OOC::

OK, first off, the cloud of rust is just that, a cloud of rust. It's 
destributing rust particals as it is carried on the wind currents 
which just happen to be blowing towards the maximal base. The dust 
trail left will not do anything since it's not coming in contact with 
metal.  Now if another bot comes in contact with the cloud ie fly 
through it or an infected bot, ie hand to hand combat contact, then 
the other bot is infected. YES, it's very contagios. SO BEWARE BOTS! 
TOUCH NOT UNLESS THEE WANT TO BE TOUCHED...BY DEATH!
